CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Restricted_Industry__c,'CRB'),false, AND(Do_Not_Call__c = false , Email_Opt_Out__c = false , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type,'HROi Client')) , NOT(ISPICKVAL(Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c,'Ecommerce')) , Out_of_Business__c = false , Benetrac_Indicator__c = false , (RecordType.DeveloperName ="CoreAccountRecordType" || RecordType.DeveloperName = "MMSAccountRecordType") , (ISBLANK( CPA_Name_Ref__c ) || CPA_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_401_k__c = false) , (ISBLANK( Banker_Name_Ref__c) || Banker_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_401_k__c = false) , (ISBLANK( Referral_National_Account__c ) || Referral_National_Account__r.Sensitivity_401_k__c = false) , (ISBLANK( Broker_Name_Ref__c) || Broker_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_401_k__c = false) , (ISBLANK( Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__c) || Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_401_k__c = false) , (ISBLANK( Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__c) || Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__r.Sensitivity_BenAdmin__c = false) , X401_k__c = false , NOT(AdvancedPartnerClients__c) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this box is checked, this prospect is workable for 401k. non HROi client Do Not Call = False Email Opt Out = False Out of Business = False Product Sensitivities = False PAYX 401k = False
CustomField.label: 401k Workable
